articles.title: Wall Street closes lower as ad tech, social media stocks drop - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. stocks ended lower on Friday as disappointing earnings from Snap spooked investors and shares in social media and ad tech firms dropped, offsetting gains from card issuer American Express following an upbeat forecast.
